frameset.edef: to release, discharge or let go

example.parse: (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS افرجت) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM السلطات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الافغانية)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (ADJP (ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_GEN أكثر) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN_NUM 500) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN سجين) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN باكستاني)))
